ATTACHMENT ID: 12785478 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

This seems to disable constant propagation pretty much everywhere in the q files.
1) It seems like it should be safe to compare string with string. E.g. in input_part4 "WHERE x.ds = '2008-04-08'" stopped triggering the optimization, even though ds is string.
2) At least the q files that purport to test constant propagation (constprog-something, cbo_const, etc.) need to be updated to change the types so it still triggers.
I changed only query execution plans and did not change the data type.
